Author: JettStone
EnhancedContent: The menu no longer appears when I click the left Windows key on my Windows 11 system. The combination keys still work, but I don't know what the problem is. I've tried resetting the task manager, but I really don't want to reinstall the system.
Title: The Start menu in Windows 11 cannot be clicked.
Description: The menu no longer appears when I click the left Windows key on my Windows 11 system. The combination keys still work, but I don't know what the problem is. I've tried resetting the task manager, but I really don't want to reinstall the system.
